body: Hi Nishant, Please find file attached. I am assuming that you are only trying to simulate one floor, so I have made the floor and the roof adiabatic. I have aligned the building with the Y axis. You can change the North rotation angle to account for orientation.[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/f-5dhOEsZkvMFobK184BK4gSZGpvOKm8R9YO8mh83UtGFLmLT5*QNyLUtDlSNyKZROG2CNvCcNPuQRrIJ5CDRmqA7aeoAoRE/Screen_Perspective.png)
